name: Easy Taco Casserole
author: Kristie Milam
instructions: In a saucepan, brown ground beef; drain. Add salsa, mayonnaise and chili powder; mix well. In an ungreased 2 quart baking dish, layer half of the meat mixture, chips and cheeses. Repeat layers. Bake uncovered, at 350Â° for 20 to 25 minutes or until heated through. Just before serving, top with tomato and lettuce.
